text: The MGC01 is a 16-bit handheld game console developed by Dutch electronic manufacturer DIFRNCE. It was unveiled in 2010 and released in 2011. It is aimed at young children, and competes with the Mi2, which is also a basic Dutch console. ==Specifications and Features== *2,7" TFT LCD screen *960x240 pixels Resolution *16-bit graphics *100 built-in games - 9 high resolution sport games and 91 exciting Arcade games *Earphone Jack *USB connection *Net weight: 85g *3pcs AAA batteries required ==External links== *DIFRNCE MGC01 Category:Handheld game consoles
title: DIFRNCE MGC01
